http:
  routers:
    matrix-router-http:
      rule: Host(`matrix.bourne.cloud`)
      service: matrix-service
    matrix-router-https:
      rule: Host(`matrix.bourne.cloud`)
      service: matrix-service
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    matrix-service:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: "http://192.168.1.15:8008"
